amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency (facilities and infrastructure) by $15 million and to reduce funding for Weapons Activities by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $15,000,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities account by $15,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 238 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 238 (Roll no. 321).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Perlmutter.
